definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: So here he was, cock of the walk, with two women to minister to his needs.
sentences.chinese: 父亲那时就像是个土皇帝，有两个女人伺候他。

definition: lit. the sky is high and the emperor is far away (idiom)/fig. remote places are beyond the reach of the central government
to exercise sole hegemony (idiom); to dominate a whole area (market, resources etc)/to hold as one's personal fiefdom
tyrannical abuse (idiom); riding roughshod over people
lit. to hide the sky with one hand/to hide the truth from the masses
to oppress the people/to act tyrannically
to be in a position of power
(of a warlord etc) to assemble one's personal army, thereby presenting a challenge to the central government
to oppress/to rule as a despot/to tyrannize
princelings, descendants of senior communist officials (PRC)
